title: Kinpatsu no Jeanie
synopsis: During the civil war a girl living in Virginia, named Jeanie, waits for her old boyfriend Robert  to marry him, according to a childish promise, but the war makes the things complicated and, Robert comes back as northerner soldier.
related_anime: ['Kaze no Naka no Shoujo: Kinpatsu no Jeanie']
voices: ['Komiya, Kazue', 'Ishimaru, Hiroya', 'Maruyama, Hiroko', 'Tanaka, Mayumi', 'Inagaki, Mihoko', 'Yamada, Yasuo', 'Saka, Osamu']
